p: All evaluations were carried out in triplicates and presented as mean ± standard deviation. Total values were calculated using “∑mean ± sqrt∑(s.d. 2)”. The Shapiro-Wilk test was performed for normal distribution testing. One-way ANOVA was conducted at 95% confidence interval using SPSS 14.0 while PCA (principal component analysis) and correlation analysis were carried out with R Studio software version 3.4.4 (2018-03-15) software. The cluster analysis (hierarchical clustering heat map) was performed using MATLAB 2018a.
